title: String Solitons in M Theory Fivebrane : A possibility of higher order U(1) bundles
abstract: A volume form $H$ on the $n$--dimensional sphere $S^n$ is closed $(dH=0)$, so that it is locally written as $H=dB$, where B is a $(n-1)$--form. In the first half we give an explicit form to B and, moreover, a speculation concerning higher order U(1) bundles. In the second half we apply our B in the case $n=3$ to a string soliton solution discussed by Perry and Schwarz.
